name: Turn of the Tide
description:
TURN OF THE TIDE: Made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48

(Theme: Deeper and Deeper)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. Operate a small Saboteur squad amidst a massive RTS battle.   With over a hundred AI units warring amongst the small villages and the main city, you have to operate deep amongst enemy lines.  Tasked with placing explosives to disrupt the enemies supply lines, or disrupting their communications by destroying the communication antennas you'll have to do your best to survive while being surrounded by your foes. Credits:     Markus Franz [Itch] - Code & Art     Cameron Paxton [Itch] - Music     GargleSmargle[Itch] - SFX

Download the soundtrack composed by Cameron Paxton here!
